@rnz_news Oh good - we needed a new "I'm relaxed about that" man since soon-to-be-Sir John Key shuffled off to Hawaii.
@RuPaul Read it on The Guardian before hitting Twitter - but it was your glorious, funny, smart self's image that made me tap on the story.
@amandapalmer If you've not read it, Norman Ohler's Blitzed. Parallels between Nazi drug use, culture and today's US horribly visible.
@amandapalmer Pop over to Wellington on 21 Jan for our March since you can't be in the US. Just 3 hours from Melbourne. xxx
@HilaryDuff Love seeing your love for your boy. Ignore the creepy nutjobs. xxx
@antonystarr Funny or offensive? It's about you or 50% of the photos are. Before they were famous: Antony Starr https://t.co/xLaxpLVQ68
@NZTAWgtn what about Horokiwi Road? Huge tree down last night over the road.
@ThatKevinSmith @smosier Mmm, govt cheese good. Rickman tee and healthy mum is best. Loved that photo.
@wallacelchapman @RNZSunday Forgetting the commercial imperative of profit? No grower will grow a valueless crop that's given away in bars.
@NathanFillion Stranger finds your keys. Shiny. You doing something to make another stranger's day a little brighter. Shinier. No pressure.
@wilw Celebrity has its own rewards. #lovepuffs. Managed to reply to the wrong tweet #fail
@wilw Ah, celebrity has its own rewards. #lovepuffs
@brian_kushner @ThatKevinSmith Um, not that spelling of "sicked" although MUCH funnier that way.
@IMKristenBell Good luck. From a woman in New Zealand. We're counting on US voters too xxx
@HarveyFierstein so sorry for your loss. Dear friends are priceless.
Bring your glorious self down here for a visit! @RuPaul @TheKhooll
@themrsthemrs @nationaltrust Support YOUR heritage. You're in the UK, buy @nationaltrust memberships. Don't short change your heritage orgs.
@RNZSunday Drugging and raping girls and boasting about it is just teenage 'bad behaviour'? CK Stead sticks by that? Relevance diminishing.
@HarveyFierstein Gorgeous, glorious, talented and great. Once again we see who leads the way and, as ever, with grace and humour. xxx
@feliciaday I grew up with mixed cold black tea and vinegar for sunburns. Odd/true. Pure, quality lavender oil works on burns. #sleepytime
@IMKristenBell Looked like kale, spinach and what we call silverbeet. All great raw when young. Hope it was tasty.
@GeekandSundry Durian? There are labour laws people! Looking forward to seeing the show. #Feel...OopsSmellBetterSoon
@frankrichny hmm a Prime Minister who also knew his people had no appetite for another war, more slaughter & loss? #WWI #WeWillRememberThem
@NzMorningReport slow news day?
@NZTAWgtn once again huge delays getting out of Wellington and NOTHING HAPPENING. No workers in sight. #SortThisShitOutPlease
@DavidBowieReal So deeply deeply sorry and saddened. Love and best wishes to his family.
@teradar the bumble also appeared to survive the encounter, unlike honeybees. PS Ironically I'm also allergic to paua. Oh well.
@teradar if no one else has already responded; I too am allergic to honey bees but have been stung by a bumble without any trouble.
@ninetonoon The "throws"? Seriously?

@NathanFillion @Kusewera Shiny. And that's some class right there Mr F.
@neiltyson And who's face do you have in your mind? We all have one when seeing such an insightful statement.
@alfranken Congratulations and best wishes to them, you and your wife. Another generation to help make the world that little bit better.
@ThatKevinSmith Screw @SKYCITYAkl - come visit the rest of NZ. But mostly Wellington...
@IMKristenBell @SPTSUSA Lovely idea. We've lost three friends - just wish they knew how much they made the world shine.
@feliciaday Keanu's the actor I can best imagine having chickens as pets.
@NZTAWgtn And yet where is Old St Paul's in this little pic? I'm looking... I'm looking. Times Square Kiss reenactment on Sunday!
@alandavies1 That it's winter and we're not good at insulation or double glazing. By 'not good at' I mean 'rubbish' or 'totally lacking in'.
@NatGeo Need to stop calling this sport. It's cowardice. Tiny people with small lives who believe killing animals makes them big.

@AfternoonsRNZ Make it stop. Make it stop. Bland music, badly performed songs. Mr Bacharach's standards clearly dropped after Cilla.

@standfornz Operations funded? No. Poverty alleviated? Er, no. $26M spent on diversionary mock debate. Least we get to see Pluto this week.
@ioangruffudd Final Forever ep just aired in NZ. Family grumpy and outraged at suggestion of no S2. We refuse to give up hope.
@AfternoonsRNZ Thank goodness that's the last song from the feature album. Can't believe it's number 1 but... well done him. Still, awful!
@stephenfry I was told to say white rabbits on 1 March only, to confuse the March Hare. Anyone else?

@simonpegg Yes. Thank you. Could be worse though. You could be in NZ during a Rugby World Cup. Shudder. Yawn. World? What world?
@stephenfry I had influenza - 1 week of piercing agony in every joint. Only thing I could stand was listening to you. Thank you so much.
@oxfamnz Congrats indeed. Your org does a great job.

@amber_benson You're so wonderfully talented. In awe!

@veronicamars Argh - can't yet. Come to New Zealand soon. We make the best coffee in the world. Ask Sir Ian.

@NathanFillion in... out, in... out, shake it all about
@stephenfry You dear sweet man. A world with Mr Fry in it is a better world.

BTW hope for all ages - my kid was prescribed sour gummy worms by his doctor. For a blocked saliva gland. Doctors are cool #Halloween
Just realised - New Zealand gets #Halloween first. Suck it world... Sorry, that was rude. And yet I haven't deleted it.
Have been lying here silently for an hour so husband can sleep in for once. Wonderful man; terrible sleeper.
@GenesisEnergyNZ why have a Twitter account? Answer your phone, get rid of the crap music and the idiot thanking me for my patience
@WgtnCC I'd be more impressed if you could get them to answer the phone.
@geonet STOP PUTTING OUT INFO UNTIL YOU HAVE THE FINAL DATA!!!!!!!!! Pointless fucking scaremongering. Fire your Comms person.
@3NewsNZ 1 in 5 odds that another big quake will happen this week? FFS that's not safe or low probability. Never studied #statistics huh?
@simonpegg 6.5 quake shook WellingtonNZ tonight. No reports of people hurt yay so hopefully The Embassy is fine too. Saw World's End Friday.
@IMKristenBell Suspect sleepless nite here too (WellingtonNZ) after 6.5 #earthquake. Hope dBird leaves you in peace and aftershocks stop!!

@simonpegg Wgtn even stocks Cornettos. But do they taste the same...?
@CharlotteBellis QueueBeck? Seriously? You're so gently professional as a presenter, really good, no inane chitchat. But QueueBeck?
@nzherald Love the idea of less $$ being returned to the community. Profits belong offshore where they'll do no good... er, I mean harm.
